title: Tom Brady 'News' & Josh Allen Talk
itunes:title: Tom Brady 'News' & Josh Allen Talk
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal & Chris Wesseling- discuss the latest “news” on the Throne Of Sleaze: Will Tom Brady play in 2018? (5:00); Another star NFL QB is not thrilled with his team (11:30), Brett Favre crashed and burned in his Monday Night Football audition (16:00) and Nick Mangold announces his retirement (20:00). Motivational speech cliches from Falcons head coach Dan Quinn (27:00); Plus, Rotoworld’s Evan Silva joins the show to talk about Wyoming QB Josh Allen and his draft stock (30:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
